attributes.action: Government & Councils to recognise recipients of the  Victoria Cross
attributes.additional_details: Examples of the recognition of the way in which the USA  respects the Medal of Honour  http://www.military.com/benefits/veteran-benefits/the-medal-of-honor.html which Govt & Councils may consider There are few living recipients so any 'burden' would not be too great in recognition of their  bravery & sacrifice http://www.victoriacross.org.uk/aalivevc.htm
attributes.background: We call on the Government & Local Councils to recognise the  outstanding bravery & potential for sacrifice which those awarded the Victoria Cross have shown and to bring forward plans to respect the award  in a similar way to which the USA  honours recipients of the  Congressional Medal of Honour
